website.name: DataFlow Dashboard
website.description: A comprehensive analytics dashboard for tracking key performance metrics, managing data visualization, and monitoring business insights in real-time

theme.name: Professional Analytics
theme.aesthetic: Clean, modern, data-driven design with emphasis on readability and functionality
theme.targetAudience: Business analysts, data scientists, executives, and team managers
theme.designPrinciples: Clarity over complexity, information hierarchy, accessible contrast, consistent spacing
theme.gradientStyle: Subtle gradients for depth, primary focus on solid colors for data clarity

pages.name: Dashboard Home
pages.layout: Main dashboard layout with sidebar navigation, top header with user profile, and grid-based content area

sections.name: Dashboard Header
sections.content: Top navigation bar with logo, search functionality, notifications, and user profile dropdown

sections.name: Key Metrics Overview
sections.content: 4-card grid displaying total revenue, active users, conversion rate, and growth percentage with trend indicators

sections.name: Revenue Chart
sections.content: Interactive line chart showing revenue trends over the last 12 months with filtering options

sections.name: Recent Activity
sections.content: Live feed of recent user actions, system updates, and important notifications

sections.name: Quick Actions
sections.content: Panel with frequently used actions like creating reports, adding users, and system settings

pages.name: Analytics
pages.layout: Detailed analytics page with advanced charts, filters, and data tables

sections.name: Analytics Dashboard
sections.content: Comprehensive analytics view with multiple chart types, date range selectors, and export functionality

sections.name: Performance Metrics
sections.content: Detailed performance indicators with comparisons, benchmarks, and trend analysis

pages.name: Reports
pages.layout: Reports management page with list view, filters, and report generation tools

sections.name: Report Management
sections.content: Table view of all reports with filters, search, and batch actions for report management

sections.name: Report Templates
sections.content: Gallery of pre-built report templates for quick report generation

pages.name: Settings
pages.layout: Settings page with tabbed navigation for different configuration areas

sections.name: User Settings
sections.content: User profile management, notification preferences, and account security settings

sections.name: System Configuration
sections.content: System-wide settings, integrations, and administrative controls

layouts.layoutStyle: Sidebar navigation with collapsible menu, top header bar, and responsive grid content areas
layouts.navigationStyle: Left sidebar with hierarchical menu structure, breadcrumb navigation, and quick access toolbar
layouts.extra: Dark mode toggle, responsive design for mobile/tablet, keyboard shortcuts, and accessibility features

templateInfo.description: Professional dashboard template optimized for data visualization, analytics, and business intelligence applications
templateInfo.cleanup: This template provides a comprehensive dashboard structure. Customize the metrics, charts, and data sources based on your specific business needs and remove any unnecessary sections.
